title: I-690 | Application for Waiver of Grounds of Inadmissibility Under Sections 245A or 210 of the Immigration and Nationality Act
description: Use this form to apply for a waiver of inadmissibility if you are an applicant for adjustment of status under section 245A or 210 of the Immigration and Nationality Act.

forms.title: Form I-690 Supplement 1, Applicants with a Class A Tuberculosis Condition
